course.subject: LANG
course.name: Intensive English Language for University Studies
course.description: This is an intensive English language course for students in their first year of study who need language enhancement and proficiency training to build a strong foundation in English. Students will develop the language skills necessary to communicate effectively and complete academic tasks in an English-medium university. They will also build skills and habits for self-directed learning at university. The content of this course focuses on developing studentsâ€™ language foundation, and tasks and activities are designed so that they can receive enhanced teacher support and feedback.
course.exclusions: LANG 1002, LANG 1003, Level 3 or above in HKDSE English Language

reviews.author: comfy_pyjama
reviews.comment_content: quite good, willing to answer student question in class
reviews.comment_teaching: quite interesting, rather than teacher-led lesson, in-class discussions occur very often .
reviews.comment_grading: B+ , it is quite difficult to get A unless you really excel in english, but actually people proficient in english will go to 1402 directly.
reviews.comment_workload:
not really, pre-lesson tasks will be given every class, and the teacher will randomly pick someone to answer questions listed in the tasks , but it is up to you, sometimes if you forgot to do it, the first 15 mins will autimatically be the time for teacher's sharing about the importance of studying proactively.
A project and few speaking and writing tests required, while reading and listening are not assessed.

reviews.author: Dickycheung
reviews.comment_content: It includes two main part: writing and speaking.you need to finish 2 electives out  of 4.The lesson is similar to the requestment of high school.Like it requires organisation in writing and speaking .
reviews.comment_teaching: The professor is interesting and he will answer every question from the students.Can see that he teaches students carefully.The lesson is interactive.He would like to talk with student
reviews.comment_workload: Workload of this course is not that high.Especailly compare to other lang course.The max words requirement in writing test is 200 words.The only large workload maybe discussion as it requires students prepare 6 topics

reviews.author: Whatsmyname
reviews.comment_content:
The content is really bad actually. I do not think it is good for improving my English skill.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Refresh: Same as my thought before, althought the writing and speaking exam is not bad, I still do not think that it can improve my English skill. i.e. It does not have any good way to get the name of the course name:"Intensive English Language for University Studies".
reviews.comment_teaching: The teacher is pretty good and I can hear that he does not like this course actually,same as me.
reviews.comment_grading:
The grade is not given
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Refresh:the grade is like the other LANG course, B- is the average grade and the grade depends to the professor and the CLE(and I think that CLE gives the grade more than the professor.) So grading:C->D
reviews.comment_workload:
The workload I think is not so many because there are only SDL and some elective homework. It is convenient for us to do some homework but actually, like I said before. It is very useless and I think we should be given more time in studying the knowledge of Science for students in Science Faculty.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Refresh: the requirement of the project is rigorous but the description of the essay is general. What I suggest, which is the most important, is that do not choose LANG1401 and LANG1402, better to tran them.
